name: t14_anon_aggregates
description: Anonymous structs, unions, and enums nested inside functions. Tests oracle_ts detection of ANONYMOUS_AGGREGATE_PRESENT and exercises complex type layouts that challenge DWARF type recovery.
oracle_pressure: Anonymous struct/union members produce DW_TAG_structure_type and DW_TAG_union_type without DW_AT_name. Oracle must detect these within function spans for the ANONYMOUS_AGGREGATE_PRESENT warning. Bitfields and enum constants nested inside functions add DWARF complexity. Decompiler output may flatten or reorder these, making source-to-decompiled matching harder.
